<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Analyze Idiolect](/Feats.aspx?ID=1997) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 178 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Linguist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=64)

**Prerequisites**
[Linguist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1993); Expert in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5); Expert in [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)

</column>

---

You break down a specific individual's idiolect, memorizing their speech mannerisms and habits. If you interact with someone for at least 10 minutes, when you later attempt to [Impersonate](/Actions.aspx?ID=46) that individual, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your Deception checks and DCs. Due to the intense character study required, you can't remember more than one idiolect at a time.
name: Analyze Idiolect
prerequisite: Linguist Dedication; Expert in Deception; Expert in Society
